headline: JPMorgan Sees Back-Half Recovery for Mondelez International, Inc. (MDLZ) Despite Cocoa Headwinds
summary: Mondelez International, Inc. (NASDAQ:MDLZ) is included among Dividend Contenders List: Top 20 Stocks. On January 21, JPMorgan lowered its price target on Mondelez International, Inc. (NASDAQ:MDLZ) to $69 from $71. It maintained an Overweight rating ahead of the company’s Q4 earnings report on February 3. The firm expects earnings momentum in 2026 to show up […]
